biotools.summary: A web-based tool to support researchers in the planning of animal experiments. It helps researches to improve the study design,  analysis and reporting of the findings to decrease the number of irreproducible research.

bioschemas.name: Experimental Design Assistant (EDA)
bioschemas.summary: A web-based tool to support researchers in the planning of animal experiments. It helps researches to improve the study design,  analysis and reporting of the findings to decrease the number of irreproducible research.
